column1: Otta Jeevitham ea uloo manasilakikko... Swargamilla Naragamilla Otta Jeevitham

Enne Aneshichu Vanna Pinne Ninne Aneshichu Varunnavark Ninne Kittukealaa
Eni Kalichaal Nammalil Oraalea Undaku.. Athu Ni ayirikkilla.
Orungiko.. Njanum ayitulla ankathin orungikoo nee
